content:
Edit-AzureRmWebAppBackupConfiguration

Syntax

Edit-AzureRmWebAppBackupConfiguration [-ResourceGroupName] <String> [-Name] <String> [[-Slot] <String>]
 [-StorageAccountUrl] <String> [-FrequencyInterval] <Int32> [-FrequencyUnit] <String>
 [-RetentionPeriodInDays] <Int32> [[-StartTime] <DateTime>] [[-Databases] <DatabaseBackupSetting[]>]
 [-KeepAtLeastOneBackup] [<CommonParameters>]
Edit-AzureRmWebAppBackupConfiguration [-WebApp] <Site> [-StorageAccountUrl] <String>
 [-FrequencyInterval] <Int32> [-FrequencyUnit] <String> [-RetentionPeriodInDays] <Int32>
 [[-StartTime] <DateTime>] [[-Databases] <DatabaseBackupSetting[]>] [-KeepAtLeastOneBackup]
 [<CommonParameters>]

Description

The Edit-AzureRmWebAppBackupConfiguration cmdlet edits the current configuration backup for an Azure Web App.

Parameters

-FrequencyInterval

Frequency Interval

Type:Int32
Required:True
Position:4
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:True (ByPropertyName)
Accept wildcard characters:False
-FrequencyUnit

Frequency Unit

Type:String
Required:True
Position:5
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:True (ByPropertyName)
Accept wildcard characters:False
-RetentionPeriodInDays

Retention Period In Days

Type:Int32
Required:True
Position:6
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:True (ByPropertyName)
Accept wildcard characters:False
-StartTime

StartTime in UTC

Type:DateTime
Required:False
Position:7
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:True (ByPropertyName)
Accept wildcard characters:False
-KeepAtLeastOneBackup

Keep At Least One Backup Option

Type:SwitchParameter
Required:False
Position:9
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:True (ByPropertyName)
Accept wildcard characters:False
-ResourceGroupName

Resource Group Name

Type:String
Required:True
Position:0
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:True (ByPropertyName)
Accept wildcard characters:False
-Name

WebApp Name

Type:String
Required:True
Position:1
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:True (ByPropertyName)
Accept wildcard characters:False
-Slot

WebApp Slot Name

Type:String
Required:False
Position:2
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:True (ByPropertyName)
Accept wildcard characters:False
-StorageAccountUrl

Storage Account Url

Type:String
Required:True
Position:3
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:True (ByPropertyName)
Accept wildcard characters:False
-Databases

Databases of type DatabaseBackupSetting[]

Type:DatabaseBackupSetting[]
Required:False
Position:8
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:True (ByPropertyName)
Accept wildcard characters:False
-WebApp

WebApp Object

Type:Site
Required:True
Position:0
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:True (ByValue)
Accept wildcard characters:False

Related Links

  • Get-AzureRmWebAppBackupConfiguration
